name: Team 1912 Python Cloud Environment
postCreateCommand: orig=$(pwd);cd /opt;wget -O wpilib_ext.vsix 'https://github.com/wpilibsuite/vscode-wpilib/releases/download/v2024.3.2/vscode-wpilib-2024.3.2.vsix';cd $orig;python3 -m pip install robotpy;python3 -m robotpy sync;pip install -r .requirements.txt
